animal.question: I meow and love to play. I like to chase string all day. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I love to drink milk.
🐈 I have soft fur and whiskers.
🏠 I often live in your house.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch and never fail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕 I am a very loyal friend.
🗣️ I can bark loudly.

animal.question: I quack and waddle in the pond. I like to swim and eat seeds beyond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🌾 I eat small bugs and plants.
🥚 I lay eggs.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give you milk. I like to graze in fields of grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I am a large farm animal.
🌱 I eat grass.
🥛 You can drink what I make.

animal.question: I have big ears and I love to hop. I like to eat carrots non-stop. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat orange vegetables.
🐇 I can be kept as a pet.
🌱 I like to eat in the garden.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears, I love to trumpet and cause cheers! What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. I have a mane. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am a very strong cat.
🥩 I eat meat.
👑 I am known as a king.

animal.question: I swing from tree to tree. I love bananas, can you guess who I might be?

hints.text: 🐒 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I peel my food before eating it.
🗣️ I make a 'ooo ooo ahh ahh' sound.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes, I am related to the horse, what am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I am black and white.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🐎 I look like a horse but with stripes.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and hiss. Some of me are poisonous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no legs.
🥚 Some of us come from eggs.
🐭 I like to eat mice.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🏖️ You can find me at the beach.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I crawl slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am an animal.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥗 I like to eat plants.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I squirt ink.
🧠 I am very smart.
🪨 I can hide in rocks.

ocean.question: I make a funny noise and love to eat fish. I can balance a ball on my nose. What am I?

hints.text: 🦭 I am a mammal.
🧊 I can swim in cold water.
🤸 I am often in a zoo.

ocean.question: I'm a home for many fish, and I'm made of tiny animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Many creatures live on me.
🌈 I can be very colorful.
🧱 I'm made of something hard.

ocean.question: I have a big fin on my back and like to sing. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🌊 I love to jump out of the water.
🗣️ People like to swim with me.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal, and I have a blowhole on my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the biggest animal on Earth.
💧 I spout water into the air.
🎶 I can sing songs.

ocean.question: I have pointy teeth and like to swim very fast. Some people are scared of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a fish.
⚔️ I am known to be a predator.
🌊 I have many rows of teeth.

ocean.question: I have a long, flexible trunk and tusks. I swim in the ocean and eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am related to an elephant.
🌿 I am also called a 'sea cow'.
🦭 I am a gentle giant.

ocean.question: I am a very small creature that glows in the dark in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 I create my own light.
🦠 I am a type of plankton.
✨ You can sometimes see me at the beach at night.
